description.name: Time Based Tokens
description.tagline: Use a smartphone to generate time based tokens for second factor auth.
description.long:
Two-factor authentication is a security process in which users are asked to provide two different authentication factors when logging in.

With Time Based Tokens, users are asked to enter a 6 digit code that is randomly generated by any compatible Time-based One-time Password generator app.

Compatible apps include Google Authenticator, Authy, Duo Security, 1Password, LastPass and more.
